snippet: With many tax cuts set to expire on Dec. 31 and some new taxes scheduled to start with the new year, many Americans’ tax bills will go up next year. Exactly how much is not yet clear, but here is how some of those changes would affect two types of...
lead_paragraph: With many tax cuts set to expire on Dec. 31 and some new taxes scheduled to start with the new year, many Americans’ tax bills will go up next year. Exactly how much is not yet clear, but here is how some of those changes would affect two types of taxpayers.
